description: A large American flag, made to fly in even the worst conditions.
A weak energy shield that protects against ballistic damage.
A large rainbow flag, The colors reflect the diversity of the LGBT community and the spectrum of human sexuality and gender.

variants.description: A large rainbow flag, The colors reflect the diversity of the LGBT community and the spectrum of human sexuality and gender.

A large rainbow flag, The colors reflect the diversity of the LGBT community and the spectrum of human sexuality and gender.  On the left side you can see a chevron that features black, brown, light blue, pink, and white stripes to bring those communities to the forefront; "the arrow points to the right to show forward movement, while being along the left edge shows that progress still needs to be made".
A large green gray and black agender flag.  The black and white stripes represent complete absence of gender, gray represents being semi-genderless, and green represents non-binary gender.

A large pink and blue bisexual flag.  The pink stripe represents homosexuality, while the blue stripe represents heterosexuality.  The purple stripe, the "overlap" of the blue and pink stripes, purple represents attraction regardless of sex or gender a.k.a bisexuality.
A large pink, blue and yellow pansexual flag.  The pan-pride flag uses pink for people on the female-spectrum, blue for people on the male-spectrum, and yellow for non-binary or genderqueer people.
A large black and purple labrys lesbian flag.  On the flag you can see a labrys, a type of double-headed axe, superimposed on a downward-pointing black triangle, set against a violet background.

A large pink, white and orange lesbian flag.  The dark orange representing "gender non-conformity", orange for "independence", light orange for "community", white for "unique relationships to womanhood", pink for "serenity and peace", dusty pink for "love and sex", and dark rose for "femininity".

A large purple, white, gray and black asexual flag.  Black for asexuality (feeling no sexual attraction), gray for gray-asexuality and demisexuality (feeling sexual attraction only sometimes), white for non-asexual partners and allies, and purple for community.

A large black, gray, white and green aromantic flag.  The green and light green stripes cover everyone under the aromantic spectrum, while represents nonromantic forms of love and attraction, and the gray and black represent all sexualities under the aromantic spectrum.

A large white, pink, and blue transgender flag.  The stripes at the top and bottom are light blue, the traditional color for baby boys.  The stripes next to them are pink, the traditional color for baby girls.  The white stripe is for people that are nonbinary, feel that they don't have a gender.  The pattern is such that no matter which way you fly it, it is always correct, signifying finding correctness in one's life.

A large green, white, and purple genderqueer flag.  Lavender, a mixture of blue and pink to represent androgynes and androgyny, white to represent agender identity, and green, the inverse of lavender, to represent all those who fall outside of the gender binary.

A large yellow, and purple intersex flag.  It displays a purple circle on a yellow field.  Yellow and purple were chosen as colors as they were viewed as free from gender associations and were historically used to represent intersex people.  The circle is described as "unbroken and unornamented, symbolizing wholeness and completeness, and our potentialities".

A large blue, black, purple, white and pink genderfluid flag.  The genderfluid flag has a pink stripe for femininity, a blue stripe for masculinity, a purple stripe for both masculinity and femininity, a black stripe for lack of gender, and a white stripe for all genders.

A large green, white, gray and black agender flag.  The black and white stripes represent complete absence of gender, gray represents being semi-genderless, and green represents non-binary gender.  The symmetry of the pattern makes it so that it's correct no matter how it flies.

A large black, purple, white, and yellow non-binary flag.  Yellow for those whose gender exists outside of and without reference to the binary, white for those who have many or all genders, purple for those who feel their gender is between or a mix of female and male, and black for those who feel they are without gender.
A large blue, green, and pink polysexual flag.  Pink for people on the female-spectrum, blue for people on the male-spectrum, and green for non-binary or genderqueer people.

A horizontally striped black and blue leather flag with a white band in the middle and red heart in a corner.  The black represents leather; the blue represents devotion, loyalty, and community; the white represents purity and innocence; and the red heart represents love for the community.

A large black and orange international bear brotherhood flag.  The flag displays seven horizontal stripes of colors ranging from black to brown representing the colors of different bear species, you can see a black bear paw in the upper right corner.

description: A large flag, made to fly in even the worst conditions.

variants.description: It has three vertical boxes of black, red, and green placed behind the royal seal of Afghanistan.
It's a solid red, overlaid with the crest of Albania.
It's divided by green and white halves, overlaid with a crescent moon and a star in red.
It has three vertical lines navy blue, yellow, and red, overlaid with the crest of Andorra.
It's divided by red and black rectangles, overlaid by a gold machete, star, and half of a gear.
It has three horizontal lines of baby blue and white, with a gold star in the middle.
It has three stripes of red, navy blue, and orange.
It's solid navy blue, with various white stars.  In the top left corner is a miniature Union Jack.
It has three stripes of red and white.
It has three stripes of light blue, red, and green.  In the middle is a white crescent moon and star.
It has a black V-shape surrounded by red.  The bottom of the V is blue, with a rising sun immediately above.
It has three stripes of light blue and yellow, with a black triangle on the far-left side.
It has a red background with a series of white spikes on the left.
It's solid dark green, with a red circle in the middle.
It has three vertical lines of navy blue and yellow, with a black trident in the center.
It has a red and green background, with a checker pattern on the left.
It has three vertical stripes of black, yellow, and red.
It has two small stripes of red, separated by a square of blue, with the emblem of Belize in the center.
It is divided into squares of yellow, red, and light green.
It is divided into triangles of red and dark yellow, with a dragon in the center.
It has three stripes of red, yellow, and green, with the crest of Bolivia in the center.
It has a yellow triangle over a navy blue background, with white stars running along one side.
It has a yellow diamond on a light green base.  In the center of the diamond sits a blue orb with a curved, white line.
It has a black and white line running through a baby blue background.
It has a diagonal black-and-white line through a yellow background, with a red lamp in the center.
It has three stripes of white, green, and yellow.
It's divided into red and green, with a yellow star at the center.
It is divided into red and green triangles, with three stars at the center.
It has three vertical beige, white, and green stripes.
It has a thin red line in the center, surrounded by white and blue.  To the left lies an oval of gold stars.
It has three horizontal lines on navy blue and red, with a palace at the center.
It's divided into three green, red, and yellow stripes, with a golden star in the center.
It has three red and white stripes, with the iconic maple leaf in red.
It has three stripes of navy blue, yellow, and red.
It has a red and white backing, with a white star on blue in the upper left corner.
It has a solid red back, with five yellow stars in the top left.
It has a yellow, navy blue, and red stripe running horizontally.
Four horizontal stripes of yellow, white, red, and blue serve as a backdrop for a sideways green triangle on the far left, with a white crescent moon and four stars in the center.
It has a diagonal tricolor of green, yellow and red radiating from the lower hoist side corner.
Five horizontal stripes of white, blue, and red run across it, with the coat of arms lying off-center.
A flag of three horizontal stripes of red, white, and blue and a checkered red and white coat of arms shield, above which stands a crown of a dark and light blue pattern.
Blue and white stripes run horizontally across the flag, a red triangle forms over the left side with a white star in its center.
A white flag with a yellow emblem of the island stands in the center, two green olive branches stand below it.
A flag with horizontal stripes of blue, white, green and yellow coloration and one vertical red stripe down the middle with a star in the upper left corner.
A flag with a blue triangle at the hoist and a horizontal white and red color on it.
A sky blue flag with a yellow star in the upper left canton, diagonally running across the flag is a red strip and yellow fimbriation.
A flag of a red field with a white Nordic cross over it.
A flag that has a white triangle in the left portion with light blue and green color running horizontally.
A green flag with a running tricolor cross of yellow, black, and white, in the center stands a red circle with a parrot in the middle surrounded by green stars.
A flag with a white cross and a coat of arms in the center with a pattern of blue and red on the outside of the cross.
A horizontal tricolor flag of yellow, blue, and red with its coat of arms in the center.
A horizontal tricolor flag of red, white, and black with a yellow eagle in the center.
It is a horizontal pattern flag of blue, white, and blue with a coat of arms in the center.
A horizontal tricolor flag, with green, white and red stripes and a blue triangle at the hoist with a coat of arms in the center.
A tricolor flag of green, red, and blue with a golden wreath surrounding an olive branch near the hoist.
A horizontal tricolor flag of blue, black, and white.
A triband flag of blue with a yellow outline and red in the middle, in the center is a Nguni shield and two spears.
A horizontally running tricolor flag of green, yellow, and red, in the center is a blue circle and a yellow star.
A sky blue flag with a Union Jack in the hoist and a shield centered in the outer half of it with the cross of Saint George within it.
A white flag with a blue Nordic cross over it.
A tricolor flag of blue, white, and red.
A horizontal tricolor flag of green, yellow, and blue.
A flag consisting of horizontal red, blue, and green stripes separated by two thin stripes of white.
It is a white field flag with a red cross of Saint George and four equilateral crosses.
A horizontal tricolor flag of black, red, and gold.
A horizontal tricolor flag of red, gold, and green, a black star standing in its center.
A striped colored flag of four white and five blue alternating horizontal stripes, with a white cross on the upper left corner.

A flag that is diagonally divided field of yellow, green, yellow, green with a red border, in addition to the six yellow stars in the border, there is a central star in a red disk and, at the hoist, a nutmeg symbol.
A vertical triband flag that features a central band of white that holds the nation's coat of arms nestled between two bands of light blue.
A vertical triband flag of red, gold, and green.
A flag that features two horizontal bands of gold and green with a red vertical band charged with a black star on the hoist side.

A flag of a green field with the black edged red isosceles triangle based on the hoist side superimposed on the larger white edged golden triangle, also based on the hoist side, pointed toward the fly-side.
A bicolor horizontal flag of blue and red, with a white rectangle in the center featuring a coat of arms.
A flag with a bicolor of gold and white with the crossed keys of Saint Peter and the Papal Tiara centered in the white band.
A flag with a horizontal triband of turquoise and white with five turquoise five pointed stars arranged in an x pattern centered on the white band.
A tricolor flag consisting of horizontal red, white and green.
A flag of a blue field with the white edged red Nordic cross that extends to the edges, the vertical part of the cross is shifted to the hoist side.
A flag that has a horizontal triband of saffron, white, and green with a navy blue wheel with twenty four spokes in the center.
A flag with a horizontal bicolor of red and white.
A flag that has a horizontal tricolor of green, white and red with the national emblem in red centered on the white band.
A tricolor flag of horizontal stripes in red, white, and black with the inscription in Kufic script in the center white band.
A tricolor flag featuring vertical stripes of green, white, and orange.
A flag that has a white field bearing two horizontal blue stripes and a blue central Shield of David.
A flag that has a tricolor vertical stripes of green, white, and red.
A flag that has a gold diagonal cross which divides the field into four triangles of green and black.
A flag of a white field with a red circle in the center piece.
A flag of a horizontal triband of black, white and green; with a red chevron based on the hoist side containing a white seven-pointed star.
A flag that features a gold sun above a soaring golden steppe eagle, both centered on a turquoise field.
A flag that features a horizontal tricolor of black, white-edged red, and green with two crossed white spears behind a red, white, and black Maasai shield.

A flag that features a horizontal bicolor of red and blue with the yellow frigate bird flying over the rising sun with seventeen rays centered on the upper half and three white wavy horizontal stripes on the lower half.
A flag that features a horizontal triband of green, white and red; with a black trapezium based on the hoist side.
A flag that features a red field charged with a yellow sun with forty uniformly spaced rays, the sun is crossed by two sets of three lines.
A flag that features a horizontal triband of red, blue and red, charged in the center a white circle.
A flag that features a carmine red field bisected by a narrow white stripe.
A flag that features a horizontal triband of red, white, and red, charged in the center is a green cedar tree.
A horizontal triband of blue, white and green charged with a black mokorotlo centered on the white band.
A flag that features eleven horizontal stripes alternating red and white, in the canton is a white star on a blue field.
A flag that features a horizontal triband of red, black, and green charged with a white crescent and five pointed star centered on the black stripe.
A flag that features a horizontal bicolor of blue and red, charged with a gold crown in the canton.
A flag that features a horizontal triband of yellow, green and red.
A flag that features a horizontal triband of red, white and light blue.
A flag that features two horizontal bands of red and green with a white vertical band on the hoist side.
A flag that features a horizontal triband of black, red, and green; charged with a red rising sun with rays centered on the black stripe.
A flag that features fourteen horizontal stripes alternating red and white, a yellow crescent and fourteen-point star on a blue field in on the canton.
A flag that features a green rectangle centered on a red field; charged with a white crescent.
A flag that features a vertical tricolor of green, gold and red.
A flag that features a vertical bicolor of white and red with the representation of the George Cross edged in red on the upper hoist-side corner of the white band.

A flag that features a blue field with two diagonal stripes of orange and white radiating from the lower hoist side corner to the upper fly side corner and the large white star with four large rays and twenty small rays on the upper hoist side corner above the stripes.
A flag that features two red stripes flanking a green field with a golden upward-pointed crescent and star charged in the center.
A flag that features a vertical tricolor of green, white and red, with the national coat of arms centered on the white band.
A flag with a light blue field with four white five-pointed stars arranged in the diamond pattern in the center.
A vertical tricolor of blue, yellow and red charged with the coat of arms centered on the yellow band.
A horizontal bicolor flag of red and white.
A flag that features a vertical triband of red and blue with a Soyombo symbol centered on the hoist-side of the red band.
A flag that features a red field surrounded by a golden border charged with the coat of arms at the center of a two headed eagle.
A flag that features a red field with a green pentagram, a five-pointed linear star.
A flag that features a horizontal triband of yellow, green and red charged with a large white five pointed star at the center.
A flag that features a white edged red diagonal band radiating from the lower hoist side corner.  The upper triangle is blue, charged with a gold sun with rays and the lower triangle is green.
A flag that features a blue field with the thin yellow narrow horizontal stripe across in the center and the large white twelve pointed star on the bottom of the stripe and near the hoist side.

A unique looking flag of two juxtaposed triangular figures with a blue colored base and deep blue borders, there being a white emblem of the crescent moon with eight rays visible out of sixteen in the upper part and a white emblem of a twelve rayed sun in the lower part.
A flag that features a horizontal triband of red, white, and cobalt blue.
A flag that features a blue ensign with a Union Jack in the first quarter and four five-pointed red stars with white borders on the fly.
A flag that features a horizontal triband of azure and white with the coat of arms centered on the white band.
A flag that features a horizontal triband of orange, white and green; charged with an orange circle in the center.
A flag that features a vertical bicolor triband of green, white and green.

A flag that features a wide red stripe at the center, bordered by a narrow white stripe both above and below, followed by a blue stripe.  The central red stripe carries a five pointed red star within a white circle near the hoist.
A flag that features a stylized yellow sun on a red field, with eight broadening rays extending from the center to the edge of the field.
A flag of a red field charged with a white fimbriated dark blue Nordic cross that extends to the edges, the vertical part of the cross is shifted to the hoist side.
A flag that features a horizontal tricolor of white, red and green with a vertical red stripe at the hoist, charged with the national emblem in the canton.
A flag that features a white star and crescent on a dark green field, with a vertical white stripe at the hoist.
A flag that features a light blue field with the large yellow disk shifted slightly to the hoist-side of center.
A flag that features a horizontal tricolor of black, white, and green with a red triangle based at the hoist.
A flag divided into four rectangles, going clockwise from the top left it features a blue star, a red rectangle, a red star, and a blue rectangle.

A flag divided diagonally from the upper hoist side corner to the lower fly side corner, the upper triangle is red with the soaring raggiana bird and the lower triangle is black with the Southern Cross of four white larger five pointed stars and the smaller star.
A flag that features a horizontal triband of red, white and blue with a coat of arms in the center white band.
A simple flag that features a vertical triband of red, white, and red.

A flag that features a horizontal bicolor of blue and red with a white equilateral triangle based at the hoist containing three, five pointed gold stars at its vertices, and an eight rayed gold sun at its center.
A flag that features a horizontal bicolor of white and red.
A flag that features a vertically striped bicolor of green and red, with the lesser coat of arms of centered over the color boundary.
A flag that features a white band on the hoist side, separated from a maroon area on the fly side by nine white triangles which act as a serrated line.
A simple vertical tricolor flag of blue, yellow, and red.
A simple horizontal tricolor flag of white, blue and red.
A horizontal tricolor flag of light blue, yellow and green charged with a sun-yellow sun in the upper fly side corner.

It is a flag that features a yellow edged black diagonal band bearing two white five pointed stars divided diagonally from the lower hoist side corner to the upper fly side corner, the upper triangle is green and the lower triangle is red.
A flag with a light blue field with a small golden isosceles triangle in front of a large white-edged black isosceles triangle in the center.
A flag that features a pale triband of blue, gold, and green, with three green diamonds in the center arranged to form a v shape.
A flag with a red field and a blue rectangle on the upper hoist side quadrant bearing the Southern Cross of four white larger five pointed stars and the smaller star in the center.
A flag that features a horizontal bicolor of white and light blue; charged with the national coat of arms in the center.
A horizontal tricolor flag of green, yellow and green with a red triangle based at the hoist and two five pointed black stars of in the yellow stripe.
A flag that features a green field with the shahada or Muslim creed written in the Thuluth script in white above a horizontal sword, having its tip pointed to the left.
A flag that features a vertical tricolor of green, yellow and red; charged with a green five pointed star at the center.
A flag that features a horizontal tricolor of red, blue, and white charged with the lesser coat of arms left of center.
A flag that features five oblique bands of blue, yellow, red, white, and green radiating from the bottom of the hoist side.
A flag that features a horizontal tricolor of light green, white and light blue.
A flag that features a horizontal bicolor of red and white, in the canton is a crescent facing the fly and a pentagon of five stars.
A flag that features a horizontal tricolor flag of white, blue, and red; charged with coat of arms at the hoist side.
A flag that features a horizontal tricolor flag of white, blue, and red charged with a small coat of arms at the hoist side.

A flag that has a thin, yellow stripe dividing diagonally from the lower hoist side corner to the upper fly side corner, the upper triangle is blue with five white five pointed stars arranged in an x pattern and the lower triangle is green.
A flag that has a single white five pointed star centered on a cyan field.

A horizontal bicolor flag of red and blue with a black isosceles triangle based on the hoist side and a green pall, a central green band that splits into a horizontal Y, centered over the partition lines and was edged in both white against the red and the blue bands and yellow against the triangle, in which the arms of the Y ends at the corners of the hoist and embraces the triangle on the hoist side.
A flag of a white field with a centered red and blue taegeuk surrounded by four trigrams.
A horizontal tricolor flag of black, red, and green, fimbriated with white stripes with a blue equilateral triangle based on the hoist side bearing a gold star.
A flag that has a horizontal triband flag of red, yellow and red charged with the Spanish coat of arms off centered toward the hoist.

A flag of a golden field with two panels the smaller hoist side panel has only two vertical bands of teal and orange and the larger fly side panel is the maroon field depicting the golden lion holding the kastane sword.
A flag that has a horizontal tricolor of red, white, and black with a green triangle based at the hoist.
A flag that features a horizontal triband of green and red with large white border with the large yellow five pointed star centered on the red band.
A flag that features a blue field charged with a yellow Nordic cross that extends to the edges, the vertical part of the cross is shifted to the hoist side.
A red square flag with a white cross in the center.
A flag that features a horizontal tricolor of red, white, and black charged with two green stars at the center.
A flag with a red field and blue canton with a white sun in the canton.
A horizontal tricolor flag of red, white, and green, with a yellow crown surmounted by an arc of seven stars at the center.
A flag that features a yellow edged black diagonal band divided diagonally from the lower hoist side corner, the upper triangle is green and the lower triangle is light blue.
A flag of five horizontal stripes of red, white, purple, white and red, the middle stripe being twice as wide as the others.

A flag of a red field with the black isosceles triangle based on the hoist side bearing a white five pointed star in the center superimposed on the larger yellow triangle, also based on the hoist-side, that extends to the center of the flag.
A flag that features five equal horizontal bands of green alternating with yellow with a red canton bearing a white five pointed star.
A flag of a red field with the white rectangle on the upper hoist side corner bearing the red Greek Cross in the center.
A flag of a red field with a white fimbriated black diagonal band from the upper hoist side to the lower fly side.
A flag of a red field with a centered white sun disc containing a red five pointed star surrounded by a red crescent.
A flag of a red field with a white star and crescent slightly left of center.

A flag of a green field with a vertical red stripe near the hoist side, containing five carpet guls stacked above two crossed olive branches; a white waxing crescent moon and five white five pointed stars appear in the upper field, to the fly side of the red stripe.
A flag of a light blue field with a union jack in the canton and nine yellow stars on the fly half of the flag.
A flag that features six equal horizontal bands of black, yellow, red, black, yellow, and red, a white disc is superimposed at the center with a gray crowned crane, facing the hoist side.
A horizontal bicolor flag of blue and yellow.
A horizontal tricolor flag of green, white and black with a vertical red bar at the hoist.
A flag with white fimbriated asymmetric red cross on a blue field with a white fimbriated counterchanged saltire of red and white.  Also known as the Union Jack.
A flag of four horizontal stripes of blue with the upper hoist side corner bearing the sun of may in the center over a white field.

A horizontal triband flag of azure, white and green, separated by two narrow red stripes.  A white crescent and three rows of twelve white five pointed stars are situated on the left side of the upper azure stripe.

A horizontal bicolor flag of red and green with a golden pall, fimbriated in black, with a black chevron filling the left hand space and two gold crossed namele cycad fronds encircled in a gold boar tusk centered on the chevron.
A horizontal tricolor flag of yellow, blue and red with an arc of eight white five pointed stars centered on the blue band.
A flag with a red field and large yellow star in the center.
A horizontal tricolor flag of red, white and black.
A flag featuring green field with an orange fish eagle in flight over a rectangular block of three vertical stripes colored from left to right in red, black and orange.

A flag of seven horizontal stripes of green, yellow, red, black, red, yellow and green with a black edged white isosceles triangle base on the hoist side bearing a Zimbabwe bird superimposed on a red five pointed star.

description: A large white flag with a shield featuring an American Native and a star which represents the state of Massachusetts.

variants.description: A large white flag with a shield featuring an American Native and a star which represents the state of Massachusetts.

A large blue flag featuring a moose and pine tree emblem on a shield supported by a farmer and a sailor, above is the north star and the Latin motto "Dirigo" ("I direct"), below the shield reads out the state of "Maine".
A large blue flag with New Hampshire's state seal of the frigate Raleigh surrounded by laurel leaves and nine stars against a field of blue.
A large blue flag featuring a shield with wreaths on both sides, a pine tree in a green field along with a cow and bales of wheat reside within the shield representing Vermont.

A large blue flag featuring a white baroque shield with three grapevines, each bearing three bunches of purple grapes on a field of royal blue, below the shield reads "Qui Transtulit Sustinet", which is Latin for "He who transplanted sustains" which represents the state of Connecticut.
A large white flag of Rhode Island that features a golden anchor in the middle of it surrounded by thirteen gold stars, below the anchor is a blue banner that reads "hope".
A large red flag, in the canton is a green pine tree on a white field.

description: A brightly-colored cape emblazoned with the "Fp" symbol.
Sable and argent fields retreat diagonally from a full-moon sigil.  Its metallic fibers reveal holographic motifs in accordance with ambient light.
//: It is worn as a half-cape.

description: A long, crimson cape that reaches the ankles.  Worn by Catholic priests for ceremonious occasions.
A primitive cloak.  tzi wore one, too.
A heavy cloak meant to be thrown over your body.
A heavy denim cloak worn over your body.  Warmer, sturdier and heavier than a cotton cloak.
A sinister-looking hooded cloak meant to be thrown over your body.  The black side is currently facing outwards.  Use it to reverse it and show the red side.

use_action.msg: Your cloak is now bathed in blood.

description: A sinister-looking hooded cloak meant to be thrown over your body.  The red side is currently facing outwards.  Use it to reverse it and show the black side.

use_action.msg: Your cloak is now one with the night.

description: A black cloak meant to be thrown over your body.  Commonly used by witches and other creatures of the night.
A heavy fur cloak meant to be thrown over your body.
A heavy leather cloak meant to be thrown over your body.
A heavy woolen cloak meant to be thrown over your body.
A long, flowing robe.  Be sure to tear it off dramatically before fighting any foes!

A plastic cloak embedded with cameras and LEDs that will render you fully invisible to normal vision when powered and worn.  You must be carrying a unified power supply, or UPS, to use it.  Activate to toggle visibility.

use_action.msg: Your optical cloak flickers as it becomes transparent.
use_action.need_charges_msg: You don't have enough UPS charges to turn on the %s

description: A plastic cloak embedded with cameras and LEDs that will render you fully invisible to normal vision when powered and worn.  It is turned on, and continually draining power from a UPS.  Use it to turn it off.

use_action.msg: The %s flickers for a moment as it becomes opaque.

description: A simple wool garment worn over the torso and upper arms.
A large plastic trash bag with holes cut out for the head and arms.
A lightweight plastic rain poncho with a hood.  It folds into a very compact form when not in use.
A bulky traditional Japanese raincoat made from straw, which covers the entire body.  Also known as mino.
Perfect for reading all those books you scavenged.
